overview: Kim Payne is senior vice president and chief financial officer of PRIMEDIA Inc., responsible for oversight of the accounting and finance functions. Payne continues to serve as chief financial officer of PRIMEDIA’s Consumer Source Inc. business. She joined Consumer Source as an accountant in 1991 and during her more than 20-year tenure with the company, has served in various finance management roles, including financial analyst, director of analysis and planning, and vice president of finance. Payne’s responsibilities have included budgeting, forecasting, acquisitions and divestitures, financial analysis and capital expenditure management.
